item.description:
this is probably the best place for XC skiing that is close to Boston area. it takes around 2 hours to get there from Boston. they have one of the best xc skiing trails in New Hampshire with quality rentals and more tan 50 KM of well groomed trails varying from beginners to very hard trails.

it will be snowing all week next week, so we are expecting one of the best times for xc skiing.

i have a place for 4 in my car, i live in 3 Kessler farm Drive, Nashua. we can carpool from there at 9 AM and head north..

my cell # 603-233-2946 (i prefer txt pls)

trails admission is $14 for adults and $9 for children

they also provide rentals for $12 for adults and $10 for children

you can add $6 and get your 1st XC skiing lesson

see you there


you might need to bring a copy of the trails map with you:
http://www.gunstock.c...
item.how_to_find_us: we'll meet at the ticket counter at 10:00 AM

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Gunstock Mountain Resort-NH
